education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science (Concurrent B.S./M.S.)
Bachelor of Science in Computer Science (GPA: 4.0)

bullets: Automated customer order validation and fulfillment with Python batch processing and AWS SQS, increasing speed by 300%.
Built concurrent worker pipeline processing 20+ batches in parallel, cutting runtime from 4 hours to 10 minutes.
Designed GraphQL endpoints and integrated AWS SQS, S3, and CloudWatch for real-time batch monitoring.
Developed a web app with iCAN to gamify medication adherence for children in clinical trials.
Implemented complex UI flows with React and Tailwind CSS to improve usability and maintainability.
Created REST API integration layer with TanStack Query for reliable frontend-backend communication.
Developed a near real-time system to identify and triangulate wireless users in signal-dense environments.
Applied transfer learning to Co-DETR models with PyTorch and scikit-learn, achieving 85% detection accuracy.

projectDetails.title: Agentic RAG
bullets: Built an agentic RAG FastAPI backend that reasons over user questions with vector retrieval.
Implemented semantic search, hybrid search, and reranking to improve answer quality.
Deployed Dockerized backend and databases to a VPS, reducing operating costs by 60%.

projectDetails.title: Aglaea
bullets: Built a production content platform supporting a gaming community with 500+ concurrent users.
Implemented transactional outbox publishing domain events to Kafka for RAG embedding invalidation.
Built Cloudflare Worker upload pipeline to R2 with JWT auth and strict file validation.
Designed trigram search and background workers with FOR UPDATE SKIP LOCKED for safe polling.

projectDetails.title: Breast Cancer Detection with CNN
bullets: Trained a CNN model for breast cancer image analysis and reached 82% detection accuracy.
Applied transfer learning with EfficientNet and Inception-ResNet-v2, improving performance by 20%.

projectDetails.title: Learn&
bullets: Built a real-time collaborative classroom platform where AI agents assess student comprehension and pair students with complementary knowledge gaps for peer learning.
Implemented AI-driven check-in system that conducts 1-on-1 conversations with each student, extracts per-topic comprehension profiles, and computes optimal study group matches.
Integrated Excalidraw whiteboards with real-time sync via Convex for professor teaching, group collaboration, and AI-generated concept diagrams.
Designed AI group chat monitor that intervenes as a confused peer student to challenge misconceptions and prompt deeper understanding.
